It is front of Aldi, Lidl, and McDonalds (you can charge your phone there, go to the bathroom and have free wifi) I didn't have any problem during the night and the morning

description: E-konet, a very clean laundry room with 4 washers of different sizes and 2 large dryers (17kg). Duration of the wash 30 minutes.

title: (17007) Girona - Carretera de Taialà
description: Free parking, good parking

name: Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
title: (17001) Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
description: The Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas is located in the Pasaje de Massaguer with location by means of the coordinates 41º59'03.2 "N and 02º48'50.1" E. Central and very well located to visit the city of Girona and its cultural heritage: the Cathedral, the neighborhood Jewish, the Arab baths, the Ramblas, the wall, the Devesa. It has 37 spaces with exclusive access for parking users, has personal assistance during working hours and is equipped with video surveillance and permanent lighting. There are intercom points inside and outside the area, to be able to communicate with the staff of the center. Parking users have differentiated health services for women, men and people with disabilities. The establishment allows you to spend the night and has a supply of drinking water, electric charge and evacuation, gray water and waste water and free WIFI service.

address.street: 14 Passatge Massaguer (Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas). Email: clientes@empark.com

title: (17007) Girona - 22 Avinguda del President Josep Tarradellas i Joan
title_short: (17007) Girona - 22 Avinguda del President Josep Tarradellas i Joan

title_short: (17007) Girona - 1 Carrer del Pont de La Barca
description: Free parking, 10 to 15 minutes walk from the historic old town. In the back area it is quiet, partly shady, with no through traffic and barely visible from the residential buildings in the neighborhood. For Wohmobile rather not suitable, but you do not stand out with a smaller vehicle (eg VW T4, Vito...) and has its rest. Occasionally someone walks by with their dog or visitors to the adjoining restaurant may use the car park (if this one still exists). For accompanying children there is a small playground within sight.

They also have a washer and dryer for pet clothes. Lots of free parking around, a large supermarket (Carrefour) and self-service gas station. Fast and efficient service, very good aroma in the clothes and the dryers with 20 minutes and at maximum dries everything very well.

We asked the other people who parked for information and they said it was better to get back to the camper before it got dark.

title_short: (17458) Fornells de la Selva - 11 Carrer de Caterina Albert

title: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
title_short: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
description:
Free area for RVs no limit nger than 6.5 meters including water, grey water/potty emptying facilities  
much glass before the cleaning Place!!!
 5 spots for overnight parking (all free of charge). There are also recycling bins right next to the parking, plus a small neighbourhood "supermarket" a few blocks away. There's also a biking route nearby the leads to Girona in one direction (6 km) and Sant Feliu de Guíxols in the other (a tad further...35 km).

Very quiet at night, but a different story in the morning, as it's adjacent to a nursery school (you can guess the rest). Also worth noting: If you're coming from Girona and your navigator suggests the first exit to Quart, take into account that it involves going under a bridge with a 3m height limit, but there's another exit a few hundred metres further.

Please DO remember that this space is shared with local residents--it's actually the parking for the nursery school, so please be discreet and civil. Having spoken to the mayor (who I ran into by mere chance, and is very friendly and understanding), I can confirm that they don't mind us using some of the other spots not reserved for motorhomes, but 1) Only use the spots in the first row, next to the free facilities and 2) PLEASE do not park sideways: it's OK if you stick out a bit, but 3 RVs taking up 15 parking spots in NOT OK. It's rare to find FREE spots like this, so please be respectful, if not out of gratitude, for continuity's sake, or in the long run they'll end up being removed. Whether we choose to see it this way or not, we *are* indeed a community, our actions will surely affect those who come after us.

title: (17004) Girona - GIV-6703
description: A Lay-by, nice place to one night.

title: (17242) Quart - Km 7 Carrer Cira de Girona
title_short: (17242) Quart - Km 7 Carrer Cira de Girona

title_short: (17184) Àrea d'Autocaravanes de l'Agrobotiga Mas Bes
description: Mas Bes Farm Area in Salitja, Vilobí d'Onyar (Girona). Routes on foot or by bike through the greenways of the municipality. At 900 meters is the hermitage of the Mare de Déu de les Fonts (17th century), at the foot of the La Crosa de Sant Dalmai volcano. Se - Granja Mas Bes offers a free visit to the Museum of the ancient crafts of the field. - Possibility of a guided tour of the farm. Saturdays and Sundays at 11:30 a.m. (ask for availability). Preparation of fresh milk, yogurts, mató and artisan ice creams. Preparation of cannelloni and fresh meat from our calves.

title: (17834) Pujarnol - 11 Carretera Pujarnol
description: Pujarnol tower. An ancient fortress dating back to the year 1200 from which you can see the sea, it currently houses a rural community immersed in the forest where 9 adults and 5 children live between the heart of Pla de l'Estany and the region of La Garrotxa. Particular place with a bell tower that was an old Torrevigía. We love having visitors! For this we have the following options: - Area for vans/motorhomes... - Camping area - Hostel (10 places) - During your stay whatever your option To sleep, you can enjoy a covered outdoor kitchen with fridge, barbecue, covered multipurpose room (former barn), solar showers, conventional shower, dry toilets distributed in different spaces, conventional and square bathroom. If you feel like it, you can join our community vegetarian/vegan lunches (at 1:00 p.m.) with products from our vegetable garden, chicken coop and Km0 cooperatives. You do NOT need to let us know if you would like to stay overnight in a van as we have plenty of space to accommodate you.

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - C-152
description: Truck parking right next to the gas station. small gas station with minimarket and shower service! Large flat parking lot between the road and the forest.

description: Great parking, quite shaded. Flat land. Cars and motorhomes. Only by day. 5 'walk from the lake. With picnic tables and garbage. Free. Good option

description: It is a recreational area next to a hermitage. Access by forest track with a steep but accessible climb. Difficult for Ac.

title: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - Carrer Solei
description: Not possible with a trailer! Very quiet area with 5 places 300m from the center, with water and electricity (electricity works according to the street lighting program). We were there and at 9am when the lights were off we had electricity. That alone, there are 4 connectors for the 5-seater, so if you're last you'll have to connect using another motorhome. For the last place you will need a 50 meter extension to reach the socket area. Be careful, the only problem is that your motorhome will be drowned in the droppings of pigeons and birds. At 100 meters you have a thermal hot spring. The inhabitants come to fill their bottles there to drink it without problem.

title: (17120) La Pera - 25 Avinguda del Marquès d'Alpens
title_short: (17120) La Pera - 25 Avinguda del Marquès d'Alpens

title: (17834) Porqueres - 100 GIV-5248
description: Day parking. Possibility of starting a hiking trail.

title: (17820) Banyoles - 210 Carrer de la Sardana
description: Parking near the lake (2 minutes).

title: (17820) Banyoles - 43 Passeig Lluís Maria Vidal
description: In between the two paid swimming areas. (I just jumped in between) Nice and quiet with a spot. Easy to access bathroom at the inside the rowing club.

title: (17154) Sant Esteve de Llémena - Unnamed Road
title_short: (17154) Sant Esteve de Llémena - Unnamed Road
description: Spacious place, where to spend the night without problems. Lots of shade and easy access.

title: (17170) Amer - 140 Carrer Santa Brígida
description: Parking available next to river bank by the municipal sports center (football etc.)  quiet and space for several motorhomes.  adjacent to town.

title: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - 41 Carrer Sant Sebastià
title_short: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - 41 Carrer Sant Sebastià
description: Self-service laundry Monday to Friday from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. Saturdays and Sundays from 9am to 1pm. It's in a shopping center. You have a supermarket, gym and gas station. Free parking in front

name: Càmping El Llac
title: (17820) Càmping El Llac
description: Very nice campsite. Nice hike around Lake Banyoles. Typical market downtown. Small train that brings to the center of the campsite

title: (17834) Porqueres - 11 Diseminado PORQUERES2 Circumval·laci
description: General mixed parking next to the Porqueres church. No overnight

title: (17834) Porqueres - 0 S N Carretera Paratge Frigolet
title_short: (17834) Porqueres - 0 S N Carretera Paratge Frigolet
description: Large car park at Porqueres. Next to camping El llac. Flat gravel terrain.

title: (17820) Banyoles - 28 Carretera Figueres
description: Wide area to park without problems and visit the lake. 5 minutes walking.

title: (17120) Púbol - 3 Plaça Constitucio
description: Car park (tables, toilets, children's games, water tap, bins) at the bottom of the village, 3 minutes from the Château de Gala. Calm and pleasant.

title: (17170) Amer - 1 Carrer Josep M. Folch i Torras
title_short: (17170) Amer - 1 Carrer Josep M. Folch i Torras
description: Perfect place to sleep and do green via carrilet bike, we were 2 nights advised by the firemen next door, there are tables and barbecue, no toilets or other services but in the village of Amer we find everything, ideal for lovers of the bike and walks

address.street: 1 Carrer Josep M. Folch i Torras

title: (17820) Banyoles - 19 Passeig de la Draga
description: water point

title: (17464) Sobrànigues - 1 Placa Nova
description: Small quiet place near the river Ter. Place for 4 vans or 2 Cc

title: (17820) Banyoles - 19 Passeig de la Draga
description: Parking next to Lake Banyoles. Picnic with table and water fountain, very nice place to visit the lake

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 65 Carretera de Sils
title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 65 Carretera de Sils
description: Large Lidl supermarket parking near the city center. Good for a night or coffee stop. No service. No height bar. Huge Chinese Supermarket in front.

name: Fangaventura
title: (17831) Fangaventura
description: Closed. It is not possible to stay the night.

title: (17240) Veïnat de Mata -
description: Location to pose and sleep one night.

title: (17834) Porqueres - 10 Diseminado PORQUERES2 Mieres
description: Just to make a stopover.

title: (17834) Porqueras -
description: Small parking lot at the end of the dirt road under the large oak trees. starting point for hiking and mountain biking, and close to the marsh for bird watching. Accessibility of the lake 2 min walk.

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 25 Carrer Salvador Espriu
title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 25 Carrer Salvador Espriu
description: Quiet, next to sports facilities and restaurant parking. Next to the enduro motorcycle area. Not serviced.

title: (17834) Porqueres - 35 Diseminado PORQUERES2 Paratge
description: Forest parking with sculptures...quiet place always open and very nice to sleep...don't forget to visit the forest full of sculptures.

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 12 Carrer Garrotxa
title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 12 Carrer Garrotxa
description: Alternative in case the nearby land parking is prohibited to park for sporting events, holidays or similar.

title: (17121) Monells - 5B Carrer del Portalet
description: Parking not prohibited for motorhomes. Very pretty historic village. Small pleasant stroll.

title: (17820) Banyoles - Carrer de Sant Martirià
description: Ground parking with a gazebo overlooking the beautiful lake. A bit of a daytime ride for hikers and cyclists, close to the road.

title: (17121) Monells - 19 Carrer de la Riera
description: Free ground parking, well leveled, with a shaded area and very close to the city. During the day there are quite a few cars. Although the road is nearby, at night most vehicles do not pass. There is a hotel air conditioning system that sounds a bit from time to time, but for us it was not a problem. We had a very quiet night. Take a leisurely stroll through this beautiful city and enjoy taking something on the spot.

title: (17117) Girona - 10 Vial Camino
description: Space to park next to the Monastery of Sant Miquel de Cruïlles. Good views, quiet and shady.

title: (17831) Sant Miquel de Campmajor - GIV-5246
description: Church parking very quiet. Very calm. Next door there are two iron swings for children.

name: Lareggae
title: (17468) Lareggae
description: The place is in the middle of the nature of Vilademuls, it is a place where you can breathe peace and tranquility, in the facilities there is a very original food truck inspired by reggae where you can eat some fabulous sandwiches (smash burger, vegetarian hamburger, suckling pig, falafel, assorted tapas) and listen to live music; from soundsystem, jam sessions, shows etc. There are toilets, a space to park campers and caravans. Fabulous saltwater pool.

title: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place next to the swamp. Difficult access as the road is somewhat cut off at the entrance. Almost 4x4 or small vehicles.

title: (17455) Veïnat de les Mateues - Unnamed Road
title_short: (17455) Veïnat de les Mateues - Unnamed Road
description: Nice quiet place to sleep in the middle of the forest with a fantastic view.

title: (17421) Riudarenes - 48 Carrer Santa Coloma
description: We were looking for a place and were able to stay the night for a party. It was Saturday to Sunday so that wasn't a problem at all and we stayed until almost 6 p.m.

title: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - 40 Urbanitzacio Malavella Park
title_short: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - 40 Urbanitzacio Malavella Park
description: Lawn atmosphere next to the Hermitage of San Mauricio, surrounded by forest. No service and unpaved access road.

title: (17121) Corçà - 9 Avinguda de Santa Cristina
description: Issue of Santa Cristina. Less than 1 km from Monell. It only has a bench and a couple of stones as a table. And a trash can. Ideal to stop to eat and even spend the night because the ground is quite smooth.

title: (17132) Foixá - 216 GIV-6422
description: Foixá, free unguarded parking and no height limit. There is a fountain in the park across the street and there are containers

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - Carretera de Farners
title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - Carretera de Farners
description: Wonderful place for hiking and rock climbing right next to the road. Very quiet at night. Hikers and mountain bikers during the day. View over a beautiful valley. Perfect starting point for hikes. We felt very safe.

title: (17831) Sant Martí de Campmajor - 23A Diseminado Sant Miquel de Campmajor
title_short: (17831) Sant Martí de Campmajor - 23A Diseminado Sant Miquel de Campmajor
description: Car park where you can park Ac during the day without problems.

title: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - Unnamed Road
description: Flat place among pine trees near the swamp, quiet to spend the night

title: (17116) Cruilles - 2 Cami St Poncio
description: Cruilles, very quiet place like the same village looks like ghost a super quiet night, super recommended

title: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of a pine forest, along a dirt road accessible to vehicles. Quiet. Respect nature!

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 63 Diseminado Diseminat
title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 63 Diseminado Diseminat
description: Spacious place with barbecues, several tables and plenty of shade. Very cool place but full of wasps (many) but it is cool. 10 minute forest road that is acceptable and some gorg next to it, perfect for precooking and no signs, although we haven't slept there

title: (17421) Riudarenes - 41 Carrer Cami de la Riera
title_short: (17421) Riudarenes - 41 Carrer Cami de la Riera
description: Quiet parking. In the middle of nature. In the village there is a supermarket and a bakery. Sundays market. Possibility of many routes by mountain bike

title: (17131) Rupià - 34 Carrer Indústria
description: Big parking in the beautiful village of Rupià, free but no services.

title: (17410) Sils - 23A Carretera Sta Coloma-palamos
description: Restaurant Parking without facilities - near a Consum supermarket and a gas station. Near the airport. We only stayed and are soon back, but very quiet night without surprises

title: (17121) Corçà - 48 Carrer Major
description: Quiet parking, no noise at night. Charming little town. Routes on foot and by bike.

title: (17834) Usall - 11 Diseminado Usall
description: Next to the cemetery but very quiet, surrounded by nature. Very good access to

title: (17240) Llagostera - 16 Carrer Panedes
description: Free parking

title: (17240) Llagostera - 50 Carrer de Fivaller
description: Quiet location 2 minutes from downtown. It is located near the cycle track and a park.

title: (17144) Colomers - GI-633
description: Perfect place to go kayaking to the Ter river

title: (17410) Sils - Aparcament de l'estació de tren, s/n
title_short: (17410) Sils - Aparcament de l'estació de tren, s/n
description: Sils is a village located at the center of la Selva and its known mostly for its Estany. The motorhome area can be found in a really quiet place, in a unique environment.

address.street: Aparcament de l'estació de tren, s/n

title: (17161) Osor - Passeig del Borrell
description: Parking area for cars and vans. We have spent the night without problems, very quiet both at night and during the day. Access to the village better from Anglés, Girona.

title: (17240) Llagostera - 6179 Carrer Rafael Mas Ripoll
description: Free zone with filling and emptying of gray water, next to the municipal swimming pool very nice air thanks to the municipality we will come back to visit this very beautiful village. Community open WIFI.

title: (17172) Les Encies -
description: Wooded area for picnic and night

name: Càmping La Vall de Campmajor
title: (17831) Càmping La Vall de Campmajor
description: Small and family campsite. It has a small farm with rabbits and chickens and a playground for the little ones. Very quiet place and in a good area to visit both Banyoles and Fageda d'en Jordà.

title: (17144) Colomers - Km. 7 GI-634
description: Large grassy area with shade near the river from the canoe club and restaurant

title: (17132) Foixà -
description: Beautiful place in the middle of nature. Next to a bridge (Ter River). The Ruta del Ter path/hiking route passes through here. We have reached the point on foot, but considering the type of cars there are, the road must be easily accessible. I can't data height or sizes of cars.

title: (17240) Llagostera - 57 Avinguda del Gironès
description: AC parking (nearby there is another in the sports center), paved access, next to a supermarket and parks next door. There are also restaurants and cafes nearby. It is not championship season, on weekends it is likely that in the morning there will be movement for basketball games.

title: (17144) Colomers - 9 GI-634
description: Parking / desert along the river and next to the kayaks.

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 42 Carrer Ramon Serradell
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 42 Carrer Ramon Serradell
description: Parking supermarket very quietly with gas station without services and in the center of the bisbal de l'empordà

title: (17161) - 2 Carrer Fransa
description: Parking near the town Osor. Parking is land for 6 cars approximately. Next to the river. Surrounded by mountains. Very calm

title: (17240) Sant Miquel d'Aro - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place in the middle of nature, it is a parking lot for hiking and mountain biking. To get there, the road is paved and winding. We went up from romanya de la Selva. Some tight passages when crossing another vehicle but it was largely doable with our 7m cc. A 3 min walk you have the Puig d'arques weather station with a 360 degree view. Magnificent sunset. No services. Space for picnicking. Ideal with a dog. Weak 4g reception. Slightly sloping ground. Passage the day of mountain biker, hiker and some motorcycles.

title: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - GI-531
description: Lawn car park with shade, very quiet, next to a hermitage where a washbasin is in very good condition. Ideal to visit the natural pools of the Brugent River.

title: (17240) Lloc - Lloc Panedes
description: Small clearing lost among the pines and cork oaks, away from the road, access by a good track and a very short dirt road, for small size only.

title: (17830) Mieres - 7 Camí de la Font
description: Place / central parking in the village

title: (17240) Llagostera - Barri de Romanya de la Selva
title_short: (17240) Llagostera - Barri de Romanya de la Selva
description: Nice little parking right on the street. At night it is quiet. From here you can reach some climbing routes.

address.street: Barri de Romanya de la Selva

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 61 Carrer del Pont
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 61 Carrer del Pont
description: Fairly flat ground parking, 5 'walk to town, good for parking and spending the night.

title: (17171) Susqueda - 16 Barri St Marti Sacalm
description: We stayed the night and everything was very quiet, but we did not lift the roof because we were next to a bar and very close to houses.

title: (17421) L'Esparra - 38 Lloc de l'Esparra
description: Very quiet place, easy access and without services. In the middle of nature among trees. Highly recommended. Rest. Masferrer 2 min. Walking.

name: Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
title: (17100) Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
title_short: (17100) Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
description: A good alternative to the motorhome area for a daytime visit in case that the 4 places at the area are full or if the motorhome area is blocked off for the Friday morning market. There was lots of space to park to visit the market and town next to the football stadium.

title: (17852) Serinyà - C-66
description: Picnic area, next to the park of Serinya caves. Spent the night without problem, hidden from the road, and in the shade all day! To access it, go to the back of the park's coach parking lot, and go around the little bridge at the bottom of the meadow, behind are the picnic tables and the bivouac! Just a little noise from the road, and some cyclists on the small path of the edge ... On the other hand, to our dismay, the cave park is only open daily in July and August, if not the rest of the year open only on weekends ...

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 11 Passeig Marimon Asprer
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 11 Passeig Marimon Asprer
description: Very nice place to visit La Bisbal and / or buy the famous ceramics

name: Càmping Rural Montori
title: (17133) Càmping Rural Montori
description: Rural campsite. Very calm. Swimming pool, playground, gas barbecues with volcanic stone, showers and toilets. 10-15 minute drive to the beach. About 30 plots, about 70m2, with 10A electrical connection and water. The pitches are designed for tent (+car), caravan (+car), van or motorhome camping. One animal only accepted.

title: (17830) Mieres - 2 Carrer de Sant Pere
description: A pàrquing near the sports center, with 3 picnic tables, soccer field, bathroom, water fountain, and a small one.

title: (17240) Veïnat de Ganix - GIV-6612
description: Area of land in the middle of a forest of oaks with multiple paths. The ground is a little sloping but there is an area between trees that is ideal for putting the van on a level ground. It is near a secondary road where not many cars pass: we arrived in the mid-afternoon and left in the late morning, only two cars passed. Very quiet night.

title: (17240) Llagostera - GIV-6612
description: A nice and quiet spot on the side of a dirt road, only a few dog walkers in the morning. we stayed only 1 night.

title: (17240) Veïnat de Ganix - Unnamed Road
description: In the heart of a small quiet wood, you can place yourself just at the hollow of the bend in the track, a little remote in the woods. Quiet, peaceful, we spent one night there without any problem.

name: Càmping Riudarenes S.L.
title: (17421) Càmping Riudarenes S.L.
description: Camping Riudarenes, simple place. Mainly permanent campers, few places for tourists. The full weekend, empty by the week. For motorhome about 7m difficult due to the size of the space. Sanitary facilities mostly old, cleanliness could be improved, hot water. Wireless. Bar on weekends Pool, currently not in operation. Wash / dry. Very friendly owner. To the mountain bike routes in the Santa Coloma area, approximately 5-6 km of driving on unpaved roads. Place far enough away from the square. Access by unpaved road but easy to drive. Dogs allowed

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 8 Plaça Pere Lloberas
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 8 Plaça Pere Lloberas
description:
Excellent modern laundry, machines of all sizes, plus special stand alone pet bed washer and dryer.
Large car park alongside so perfect access.

title: (17166) Susqueda - 21 Barri St Marti Sacalm
description: Wonderful place to sleep and spend the day with spectacular views of the distance and the susqueda dam. There are two picnic tables covered by a small roof. 360° view of the mountain range, easily accessible by van.

title: (17411) Vidreres - 120 Carrer Orient
description: Parking 200m from the center and starting point of several excursions.

title: (17830) Mieres - GI-524
description: In a field 500 m from a small road with little traffic. Below facing a pine forest ideal for a lunch or a night. The sun comes over the forest. No service.

title: (17411) Vidreres - Passatge Oriente
description: Ground parking at the edge of a field. Calm in small town.

title: (17100) Sant Pol -
description: Quiet place to rest without noise surrounded by nature.

name: Càmping l'Alguer
title: (17172) Càmping l'Alguer
description: Small family campsite at a very good price. There is a small restaurant bar, different plots, bungalows and a large free camping area next to the pool.

title: (17240) Romañá de la Selva - 2 Carrer de Josep Maria Cama I Codina
title_short: (17240) Romañá de la Selva - 2 Carrer de Josep Maria Cama I Codina
description:
It is in Romañán de la Selva. The site is beautiful. It has no services and I think that is what makes it such a quiet place. It is the town of the writer Mercè Rodoreda, read La Plaza del Diamante which is a very very good work. In the town there are absolutely no services, just a fancy restaurant where foreigners go for pasta.
Max. 3.5 tonnes.

address.street: 2 Carrer de Josep Maria Cama I Codina

title: (17411) Vidreres - 35 Carrer Maçanet
description:
***For reasons connected with the local Vidredes 2023 celebrations, the motorhome park will be closed from 25 August to 12 September ***. 


Ample car park where you can spend the night with water loading and black and gray water emptying services. Located near the center and the municipal sports hall. Starting point for excursions and with walking access to the various shops in the town.

title: (17166) El Far - 73 Barri el Far
description: Parking at the foot of the lighthouse sanctuary, spectacular views, barbecue area, bar and children's playground. We do not know if you can sleep, being a holiday we have stopped in the BUS zone to take some photos from the viewpoint.

title: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - 13 Carrer Sant Salvador
title_short: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - 13 Carrer Sant Salvador
description: Parking for a play area in a housing estate. Very quiet and close to the greenway.

title: (17240) Santa Cristina de Aro - GIV-6612
description: It is a fairly flat, shaded, calm ground car park. There is no prohibition sign so we stayed there overnight and there was no problem. During the day there is just a little crowding because hikers and others stop here because there are dolmens, and dirt roads. No service.

title: (17240) Romanyà de la Selva - 28 Carrer de Lluís Esteva
title_short: (17240) Romanyà de la Selva - 28 Carrer de Lluís Esteva
description: Quiet viewpoint with a house nearby where there was no one. room for about 4 cars. There is no shadow. The road is fine but a motorhome I don't know if it could get there.

title: (17240) Romanyà de la Selva - Carrer de Felix d'Azua
title_short: (17240) Romanyà de la Selva - Carrer de Felix d'Azua
description: At the end of a dirt road, end of the road, flat area, beautiful view of the Santa Cristina d'Aro valley (fireworks on the evening of August 4!). Ok for one night, but houses nearby. Very calm. Special dedication to T&M ...

name: Càmping Molí de Vilamala
title: (17172) Càmping Molí de Vilamala
description: Offering garden views, Càmping Molí de Vilamala is located in Les Planes d'Hostoles and has a shared lounge, a garden, barbecue facilities and a terrace. Free WiFi and private parking are available at the campsite.

title: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - 9 Carrer del Nogue
title_short: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - 9 Carrer del Nogue
description: Parking day and night

title: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - 1 Carretera Girona
description: Ground parking next to the soccer field and the greenway. Almost next to the Gorg de Can Poeti and start of one of the roads to the Gorg Molí dels Murris.

title: (17483) Bàscara - 5 Carrer les Lleterias
description: The car park is part of the sports hall and the school, on weekends there is a large influx of people and on weekdays at school start and end times the car park is used to pick up and drop off children, as well as the school bus. park between lines.. thank you very much...

name: Camping Ridaura - Llagostera
title: (17240) Camping Ridaura - Llagostera
description:
Llagostera, C-65. Camping ridaura
don't have to straddle the departure time of the place if not reserved
